name: pdq-checkout
description: E-commerce checkout flow with NestJS + React (Microservices Architecture)

scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:orders" "npm run dev:payment" "npm run dev:web"
scripts.build: npm run build:api && npm run build:orders && npm run build:payment && npm run build:web
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd apps/api && npm install && cd ../orders && npm install && cd ../payment && npm install && cd ../web && npm install
